name: Cumulonimbus
author: beeender

sections.description:
This is a similar plugin with WP-Cumulus (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wp-cumulus/) but implemented with HTML5.

This plugin requires the modern browsers which support HTML5.
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file and extract the contents.
  2. Upload the ‘cumulonimbus’ folder to your plugins directory (wp-content/plugins/).
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Find a place for this widget in appearance->widgets.
sections.changelog:
0.20

  • Fix bug with chromium’s minimal font size.
  • Change to use HTML5 canvas transform/scale feature instead of adjusting font size.
  • Add font color setting.
  • Add background alpha value setting.
  • Add maximum font size setting.

0.10

  • The first version.

short_description: Cumulonimbus allows you to display your site's tags on the surface of a rotating sphere.
description:
This is a similar plugin with WP-Cumulus (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wp-cumulus/) but implemented with HTML5.

This plugin requires the modern browsers which support HTML5.
